title: Ross's French onion soup
ingredients: ['2oz / 55g of butter', '1lb / 450g of onions, sliced', '1 clove of garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon of plain flour', '2 pints / 1.2 litres of beef stock', '2oz / 55g of Gruyere cheese, grated', '1 teaspoon of dry English mustard', '4 slices of French bread', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
